name: Solitary Knight, Gancelot
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of the "Blaster Blade" on your (VC) or (RC) get [Power] +10000.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, your front row circles with "Blaster Blade" on them become (VC). ((VC) abilities activate, and perform drive checks)

name: Goddess of the Full Moon, Tsukuyomi
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], choose up to three cards with "Tsukuyomi" in their card names from your soul, and draw cards equal to the number of cards chosen. If you drew three cards, look at five cards from the top of your deck, put up to two cards from among them on the top of your deck in any order, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[AUTO](VC):When you reveal two or more triggers during your drive check this turn, until end of turn, three of your front row units get [Power] +10000.

name: Blazing Lion, Platina Ezel
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and change this turn's first drive check to "look at two cards from the top of your deck, reveal one card from among them in your trigger zone, and call one card from among them to (RC).". If your soul has two or more grade 3 cards, change the second drive check of the turn and more as well.

name: Shura Stealth Dragon, Jamyocongo
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed and at the end of each turn, your opponent chooses six cards from his or her hand, and discards the rest of the cards from his or her hand. If your soul has a grade 3, your opponent chooses four cards instead of six.

name: Eradicator, Gauntlet Buster Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 for each of your opponent's open front row (RC).
[ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], and bind all of your opponent's front row rear-guards. You may move all of your opponent's back row rear-guards to a (RC) in the same column.

name: Knight of Truth, Gordon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, all of the "Blaster Blade" on your (VC) or (RC) get [Power] +5000. If your "Blaster Blade" is in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Knight of the Harp, Tristan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Blaster Blade", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Goddess of the Half Moon, Tsukuyomi
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your ride phase, look at five cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order, and discard a card from your hand. If you discarded "Goddess of the Full Moon, Tsukuyomi", ride it as [Stand], and you cannot ride this turn.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that it attacked a vanguard, if "Goddess of the Crescent Moon, Tsukuyomi" is in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

name: Goddess of the Crescent Moon, Tsukuyomi
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your ride phase, if "Godhawk, Ichibyoshi" is in your soul, look at five cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order, and discard a card from your hand. If you discarded "Goddess of the Half Moon, Tsukuyomi", ride it as [Stand], and you cannot ride this turn.

name: Advance of the Black Chains, Kahedin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call one card from among them to (RC), shuffle your deck, and if "Stronghold of the Black Chains, Hoel" is on your (VC) or (RC), draw a card.

name: Stronghold of the Black Chains, Hoel
effect: [CONT](RC):Your other unit in the same column as this unit that was placed this turn gets [Power] +5000. If "Advance of the Black Chains, Kahedin" is on your (VC) or (RC), it gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.

name: Stealth Beast, Tamahagane
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and return it to hand. If it was returned, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
[CONT](RC):If your opponent's hand has four or less cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Fiendish Sword Eradicator, Cho-Ou
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a column, bind one of your opponent's front row rear-guards in that column, and move up to one back row rear-guard in that column to the front row (RC).
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, if your opponent's front row has no rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Powerful Sage, Bairon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other rear-guard is placed, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your damage zone has more cards than your opponent's, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and draw two cards.

name: Great Sage, Barron
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit attacks, you may have that unit get [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If the unit that got +5000 is grade 3 or greater, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], retire this unit], and that unit gets [Critical]+1 until end of turn.

name: Soul Guiding Elf
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's sentinel is placed on (GC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and you draw a card.

name: Evil-eye Princess, Euryale
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When you look at your deck by an effect during your turn, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. (Activates from "look", "reveal", "search" effects. [Soul-Charge 1] regardless of number of cards looked at with one effect)
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw two cards.

name: Battle Sister, Macaron
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When you look at your deck by an effect during your turn, you may have this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. (Activates from "look", "reveal", "search" effects. +10000 regardless of number of cards looked at with one effect)

name: Maiden of Libra
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked a vanguard while boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Shura Stealth Dragon, Tendocongo
effect:
[AUTO]:When retired from a front row (RC) during your opponent's turn, you may draw a card.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, if your opponent's hand has four or less cards, you may call this card to (RC).

name: Stealth Rogue of Reckless Action, Suou
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is "Shura Stealth Dragon, Jamyocongo", until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and when your opponent would call units to (GC) from hand for the battle this unit attacked, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Stealth Fiend, Tsumujibashou
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, discards it, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each grade of that card. Your opponent reveals the top card of his or her deck and puts it into his or her hand.

name: Thunder Break Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, when this unit would attack, it battles all of your opponent's front row units in one attack.
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and your opponent moves each of his or her back row rear-guards to open front row (RC). (They may move diagonally)

name: Supreme Army Eradicator, Zuitan
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is bound during your turn, this unit and all of your "Eradicator, Gauntlet Buster Dragon" on (VC) and (RC) get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked a vanguard, if your opponent's front row has no rear-guards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.

name: Dragon Dancer, RaiRai
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Thunder Break Dragon" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, and this unit is on a (RC), put this unit into your soul.

name: Decorous Knight, Hengist
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 2] grade 3], call any number of cards from your hand to (RC), and those units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have three or more rear-guards, when your opponent would call units from hand to (GC) this turn, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Knight of Determination, Lamorak
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have five or more units, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Purebright Unicorn
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have three front row units, [Soul-Charge 1].
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have five or more units, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Indestructible Knight, Earina
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Pluck Enchanter
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your "Blaster Blade" is placed, [Soul-Charge 1], and if there are no face up cards in your damage zone, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Fusilli Magus
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], one of your vanguards with "Magus" in its card name gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Convoy Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded during your turn, you may put this card into your soul.

name: Diviner Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Stealth Rogue of Proscription, Mizukaze
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 3], and until end of turn, your opponent cannot call grades that he or she had called that turn from hand to (GC). (They can be called at the same time. If a grade 1 was called, 1 cannot be called for the rest of the turn)

name: Stealth Dragon, Daidoku
effect: [AUTO]:When retired from (RC) during your opponent's turn, you may draw a card.

effect: [AUTO](RC)/(GC):When placed from hand, if your damage zone has no face up cards, [Counter-Charge 1].

effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, and if it was bound, two of your units in the same column as that unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
